title: Use uploaded drawing as mascot and add subtle red accent

requirements.text: Generate a new mascot/logo image derived from the uploaded image (Untitled_Artwork.jpeg) with a subtle hint of red while preserving the sketch/hand-drawn style, and export it as a square transparent PNG static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated.

quotes: i would like the hint of red and make the given picture the m ascot

acceptanceCriteria: A new PNG mascot asset exists in frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filename specified in imageRequirements.required.
The mascot has a subtle red accent (not fully saturated, not dominant) and otherwise fits the existing grunge/sketch aesthetic.
The exported PNG has a transparent background and is visually centered with appropriate padding for use at small sizes (e.g., 40x40) without cropping.

requirements.text: Update all mascot/logo usages to use the newly generated mascot asset (HeroSection, TopNav, FooterSection) while keeping existing English alt text consistent with the brand name.

quotes: make the given picture the m ascot

acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSection.tsx uses the new mascot asset path in its .
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx uses the new mascot asset path in its .
frontend/src/components/sections/FooterSection.tsx uses the new mascot asset path in its .
All updated mascot tags retain English alt text and do not introduce non-English UI text.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not edit files in frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, or frontend/src/main.tsx (immutable paths).
Backend must remain single-actor; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Adding new sections/features (e.g., the "write your thoughts" input area) beyond switching the mascot asset.
Changing the global grunge theme palette or typography beyond what is necessary to display the new mascot asset.

required: Hand-drawn sketch mascot derived from the uploaded portrait, with a subtle red accent and transparent background (timepass-mascot-logo-upload-redhint.dim_512x512.png)
